title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define default line delimiters for new files
description:
Bug 3970 - The Windows workstations are used as X terminals to run Eclipse, as they are cheaper than Unix boxes. Currently, when creating a new file, the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties('line.delimiter') is used, which may not always be desired by the user. There should be a UI (Preference) provided by the Workbench for defining the line delimiter for new files. The possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. This UI should be used by all plugins to ensure consistency in line delimiters for new files.

NOTES: [Please provide any additional notes here]
OB: The current behavior is to use the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties('line.delimiter') when creating a new file.
EB: The expected behavior is that even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters, as the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) provided by the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. The possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter.
